name: singleton
posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

dsense.name: singleton
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: a man or woman who does not have a romantic or sexual partner

dsense.name: singleton
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: one baby or baby animal that is born and is not a twin, etc.

dsense.name: singleton
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: a playing card that is the only one of that suit that a player has
trans_examp.trans_cn: 单张（所发13张牌中属某一花色的唯一的一张那个牌）

example.eg: Jack has a singleton in hearts.
example.egtrans: 杰克有一张唯一的红桃。
